434135ab-3db9-4a27-8de6-18f6e04daa99.description: Pharmacy technicians play an important role as pharmacists’ roles transition to more clinically-focused tasks, technicians have an opportunity to assume expanded roles and responsibilities, including technician product verification (TPV). eee4f309-1de1-4a83-84cd-8d11b60398fd.description: Pharmacists and pharmacy technicians play a vital role in the provision of MTM services to patients in both community and institutional settings. eee4f309-1de1-4a83-84cd-8d11b60398fd.name: Pharmacy Technician Enhanced Training: Medication Therapy Management

badge_template_activities.title: Pharmacy technicians can play a vital role in the process of delivering Medication Therapy Management (MTM) services. This 8-hour, PTCB-Recognized, certificate program will explore the role of the pharmacy technician and the pharmacist in providing MTM services to patients. This series is developed based on the blueprint for the Pharmacy Technician Certification Board’s Medication Therapy Management Certificate, meaning those who complete this program will be prepared to sit for the PTCB exam.

Completion of the 50-question final exam with at least a minimum score of 70%. You have three attempts to pass and are not permitted to leave the final exam in the middle and return at a later time. The final exam has no time limit.

f06b1b1d-2e21-4951-9bf6-e19484e9f445.name: Pain Management Specialty Pharmacist: Managing Opioids

b48cde99-f886-4ec6-8eac-45118204d54b.description: Earners of the freeCE Billing and Reimbursement Certificate have demonstrated their advanced understanding of third-party payers and reimbursement systems utilized within the pharmacy. Topics include: billing and reimbursement in the pharmacy, which facilitates patient access to medication, insurance programs & eligibility requirements, claims processing and adjudication, prior authorization, and audits and compliance. All of which contribute to the foundations of billing and reimbursement.
b48cde99-f886-4ec6-8eac-45118204d54b.name: Pharmacy Technician Enhanced Training: Billing & Reimbursement

Pharmacists completing this program are competent in initiating open and fruitful discussions with patients facing this challenge and understand the legal and regulatory aspects of this special area of practice.
ac7abe56-919a-48af-ab43-46a77ba18284.name: Reproductive & Fertility Care Specialty Pharmacist

dbe2accb-bcce-4854-91fb-b1800842bb17.description: In this self-paced course consisting of six on-demand modules, pharmacists will learn about their role in dispensing and counseling on medicinal cannabis. The Cannabis Specialty Pharmacist course is a 6-hour specialty certificate aimed at helping pharmacists understand the pharmacology and clinical care concerns of prescription cannabinoids including dosage, drug interactions, and side effects. Pharmacists will become experts in medicinal cannabis and earn CEs for their work.
dbe2accb-bcce-4854-91fb-b1800842bb17.name: Cannabis Specialty Pharmacist

aa79e77e-8294-460f-ae90-4b7354048234.description: This program is pulls together principles from the freeCE's other Pain Management training programs (Managing Opioids & Non-Opioid Pain Management), culminating in an extensive discussion of "best practices" for pain management in the midst of the opioid crisis, making full use of ancillary and adjunctive options, both pharmacologic and non-pharmacologic.
aa79e77e-8294-460f-ae90-4b7354048234.name: Pain Management Specialty Pharmacist: Ancillary and Adjunctive Pain Management

This certificate program requires a preceptor to review and complete demonstration documentation in order for technicians to become point-of-care testing specialists.
a4043841-c33a-4061-a9b5-69524f63a8b6.name: Pharmacy Technician Enhanced Training: Point-of-Care Testing

alignments.name: PTCB-Recognized Point-of-Care Testing Certificate Training Program
alignments.description: freeCE's Pharmacy Technician Enhanced Training: Point-of-Care Testing Program is a PTCB-Recognized Education/Training Program. Earners have the option to complete the PTCB Point-of-Care Testing Certificate and earn an additional badge once the exam has been passed.

alignments.name: ACPE Continuing Education Provider
alignments.description: PharmCon, Inc. is accredited by the Accreditation Council for Pharmacy Education (ACPE) as a provider of continuing education.

alignments.name: PTCB Continuing Education
alignments.description: PharmCon, Inc, offers pharmacy technician-specific activities for all PTCB recertification and reinstatement candidates. Pharmacy technician-specific activities are indicated both in the TARGET AUDIENCE description and the ACPE UNIVERSAL ACTIVITY NUMBER (denoted with a T at the end).

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of 4 on-demand learning modules

Completion of the 50-question final certificate exam with at least a minimum score of 70%. You have three attempts to pass and are not permitted to leave the final certificate exam in the middle and return at a later time. The final certificate exam has no time limit.
